meanings.definition: Not having a shiny or reflective surface.
meanings.sent1: The nonglossy paper absorbed the ink quickly.
meanings.sent2: I prefer a nonglossy finish on my photographs for a more natural look.
meanings.sent3: The nonglossy paint made the room seem cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: Her nonglossy hair reflected her down-to-earth personality.
meanings.sent5: The nonglossy texture of the fabric felt soft to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The artist chose a nonglossy paint for a more subtle effect.
meanings.sent2: The old book had a nonglossy cover that showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The nonglossy shoes matched his casual style perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her nonglossy smile showed genuine happiness.
meanings.sent5: The nonglossy surface of the table hid scratches well.

meanings.sent1: The nonglossy screen reduced glare and eye strain.
meanings.sent2: The nonglossy finish on the car made it less flashy.
meanings.sent3: The nonglossy paint color made the room feel peaceful.
meanings.sent4: His nonglossy outfit was understated yet elegant.
meanings.sent5: The nonglossy appearance of the rock made it blend into the landscape.
